Cryptids.name: Big Foot
Cryptids.description: Bigfoot, often referred to as Sasquatch, is a legendary and elusive creature believed to inhabit the forests and remote regions of North America.
Cryptids.additionalInfo: A creepypasta is a horror-related legend which has been shared around the Internet. The term creepypasta has since become a catch-all term for any horror content posted onto the Internet. These entries are often brief, user-generated, paranormal stories that are intended to frighten readers. The subjects of creepypasta vary widely and can include topics such as ghosts, cryptids, murder, suicide, zombies, aliens, rituals to summon entities, haunted television shows, and video games. Creepypastas range in length from a single paragraph to extended multi-part series that can span multiple media types, some lasting for years.

Cryptids.name: MothMan
Cryptids.description: Described as a human-sized insect figure with large, glowing red eyes and enormous, moth-like wings, Mothman first gained notoriety in the 1960s in Point Pleasant, West Virginia.
Cryptids.additionalInfo: A creepypasta is a horror-related legend which has been shared around the Internet. Cryptids.name: Windego
Cryptids.description: Described as a gaunt, emaciated figure with glowing eyes, sharp fangs, elongated limbs, and horrific odor.
Cryptids.additionalInfo: A creepypasta is a horror-related legend which has been shared around the Internet. Cryptids.name: Chupacabra
Cryptids.description: Bigfoot, also commonly referred to as Sasquatch, is a large and hairy human-like mythical creature alleged by some to inhabit forests in North America, particularly in the Pacific Northwest.
Cryptids.additionalInfo: A creepypasta is a horror-related legend which has been shared around the Internet. The term creepypasta has since become a catch-all term for any horror content posted onto the Internet.
